15_char_password.validationMessage: The password must be 8 to 15 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { ! , @ # $ % ^ * ? _ ~ }

timezone.description: The timezone for the LITP Management Server.

ipv4_allow_duplicates.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv4 format and can only contain numeric characters: 0-9 and the special character { . }
ipv4_allow_duplicates.description: This must be a valid IPv4 address.

dual_stack_validation_allow_duplicates.validationMessage: Input must follow either the IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR format
dual_stack_validation_allow_duplicates.description: This should be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR address.

any_string_max_length_2.validationMessage: Input must be between 1 and 2 characters long
any_string_max_length_2.description: This must be any string of max length 2.

any_string_no_duplicates.description: This must be a unique string.

locale.description: The locale for the LITP Management Server.

uuid.validationMessage: Input must be 32 characters long and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: a-f, A-F and 0-9
uuid.description: This must be a valid UUID.

mac.validationMessage: Input must follow the format _:_:_:_:_:_ and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: a-f, A-F, 0-9 and the special character { : }
mac.description: This must be a valid MAC address.

ipv6_cidr.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv6 CIDR format and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: A-F, 0-9, and the special characters { : / }
ipv6_cidr.description: This must be a valid IPv6 CIDR.

ilo_password.validationMessage: The password should contain at least from three of the following four types of characters: uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and non-alphanumeric. The password must be 8 to 20 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { ! @ # % ^ & * ( ) ~ _ + { } | : < > ? - = [ ] \ ; , . / }
ilo_password.description: Please do not change default passwords used during the installation. At present only these default passwords are allowed.

password.validationMessage: The password must be 8 to 20 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) ~ _ + { } | : < > ? - = [ ] \ ; , . / }
password.description: Please do not change default passwords used during the installation. At present only these default passwords are allowed.

hostname.description: This must be a valid hostname.

ipv4.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv4 format and can only contain numeric characters: 0-9 and the special character { . }
ipv4.description: This must be a valid IPv4 address.

ip_version.description: This must be either IPv4, Dual, or IPv6_EXT.

any_string_max_length_64.description: This must be any string of max length 64.

true_false.description: This must be either true, or false.

ipv6.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv6 format and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: a-f, A-F, 0-9 and the special character { : }
ipv6.description: This must be a valid IPv6 address.

ipv4_cidr.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv4 CIDR format and can only contain numeric characters: 0-9, and the special characters { . / }
ipv4_cidr.description: This must be a valid IPv4 CIDR.

alphanumeric_dash_underscore_max_length_.validationMessage: The input must only contain alphanumeric, underscore (_), and dash (-) characters and be between 1 and 32 characters long.
alphanumeric_dash_underscore_max_length_.description: Must be 1 to 32 characters long and may include alphanumeric, underscore (_), and dash (-) characters.

deployment_id.validationMessage: Input must not be only integers, must be between 1 and 30 characters long and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and special character { - }
deployment_id.description: A unique string to identify the deployment. This ID should be unique for each ENM deployment.

keyboard.description: The keyboard for the LITP Management Server.

ipv6_or_ipv6_cidr.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv6 or IPv6 CIDR format and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: a-f, A-F, 0-9, and the special characters { : / }
ipv6_or_ipv6_cidr.description: This must be a valid IPv6 or IPv6 CIDR.

any_string_max_length_128.description: This must be any string of max length 128.

san_password.validationMessage: The password must contain at least one upper and lower case letter, one numeric and one special character. The password must be 8 to 40 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { ! , @ # $ % ^ * ? _ ~ }

wwpn.validationMessage: WWPN should consist of exactly 16 hexadecimal characters (0-9, a-f, A-F).

ipv6_cidr_allow_duplicates.validationMessage: Input must follow the IPv6 CIDR format and can only contain the following alphanumeric characters: A-F, 0-9, and the special characters { : / }
ipv6_cidr_allow_duplicates.description: This must be a valid IPv6 CIDR.

san_password_unity.validationMessage: The password must contain at least one upper and lower case letter, one numeric and one special character. The password must be 8 to 40 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { " ` $ ' ( \ ) ! ~ # < > * ; | and space }

password_satisfy_three_of_four_types.validationMessage: The password should contain at least from three of the following four types of characters: uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and non-alphanumeric. The password must be 8 to 20 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) ~ _ + { } | : < > ? - = [ ] \ ; , . / }
password_satisfy_three_of_four_types.description: Please do not change default passwords used during the installation. At present only these default passwords are allowed.

cluster_id_integer_0_65535.validationMessage: Input must be a number between 0 and 65535
cluster_id_integer_0_65535.description: Must be unique in the environment and must be between 0 and 65535.

port.validationMessage: Input must be 22 or any integer number between 1025 and 65535 (inclusive)
port.description: This must be a valid port.

any_string_max_length_32.description: This must be any string of max length 32.

vc_profile.validationMessage: Input must be in the format "ENM_ME_" or "ENM_SE_", followed by one or more word characters, and ending with "_node" or "_node_full_height"
vc_profile.description: This must be a valid VC profile.

dual_stack_validation.validationMessage: Input must follow either the IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR format
dual_stack_validation.description: This should be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR address.

san_password_vnx.validationMessage: The password must contain at least one upper and lower case letter, one numeric and one special character. The password must be 8 to 40 characters in length and can only contain alphanumeric characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and the special characters { " ` $ ' ( \ ) & ! ~ # < > * ; | and space }

autoPopulationTypes.name: JGroups
autoPopulationTypes.description: Due to the large number of IP addresses required on the jgroups VLAN, the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

autoPopulationTypes.name: Backup
autoPopulationTypes.description: Due to the large number of IP addresses required on the backup VLAN, the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

autoPopulationTypes.name: Internal
autoPopulationTypes.description: Due to the large number of IP addresses required on the internal VLAN, the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

autoPopulationTypes.name: Storage
autoPopulationTypes.description: Due to the large number of IP addresses required on the storage VLAN, the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

autoPopulationTypes.name: Services IPv6
autoPopulationTypes.description: Due to the large number of IP addresses required on the ipv6 VLAN, the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended. VLAN-1: x.x.10.0/23, VLAN-2: x.x.20.0/23, VLAN-3: x.x.30.0/23.

the minimum subnet size is /23. It is also recommended to not place these subnets alongside each other, e.g. a layout similar to the following is recommended.
storage_subnet.description: The subnet/netmask of the storage VLAN.

longDescription: 1. Use Printable Ascii-7 Characters (e.g. $ is ok, £ is not): a-z A-Z 0-9. !@#$ %^&*()~_+{}|:<>?- =[]\;,./.,
2. Password should be between 8 and 20 characters in length.
3. The following characters should not be used: space, single quote, double quote &backtick.
4. For Unity Storage the following password characters can be used ,@%^_?
5. Password should contain at least from three of the following four types of characters: uppercase, lowercase, numeric, and non-alphanumeric.
